content.value:
Weekend achievement unlocked: If you've got snow outside, don't waste it! 
Why not have a bath with a lovely cold bottle of wine?! 🍾 

Fill up a bowl with the snow, insert bottle of choice, and feel smug about it for days! 😁🙌
content.html: Weekend achievement unlocked: If you've got snow outside, don't waste it! Why not have a bath with a lovely cold bottle of wine?! 🍾 Fill up a bowl with the snow, insert bottle of choice, and feel smug about it for days! 😁🙌
